entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023
